are not expected to (and rarely ever will) enter the exact number of hours listed in your Schedule (\\\"Estimated hours\\\").\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Even more: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"for the assignments mass-loaded to PSA using data migration the system does not automatically account for holidays, and these days appear with working hours (marked with a blue background though).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is explained below how to enter the Actual hours after adding \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are reporting time on a global project you have no assignment on, click on \\\"magnifying glass\\\" in the Project / Assignment line and select the corresponding project from the list of projects in the Project/Assignment Lookup \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For each project copied to the top section click \\\"Add Tasks\\\" under it and select relevant tasks from the \\\"Select Tasks\\\" window.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":56598,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9517c4fe-96ad-41ba-9fd2-ad76fd7c21ad/psa9.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9517c4fe-96ad-41ba-9fd2-ad76fd7c21ad/psa9.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"psa9.PNG\",\"name\":\"psa9.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9517c4fe-96ad-41ba-9fd2-ad76fd7c21ad\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":656,\"height\":317},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Order Tasks by Name if you have a long list of tasks.\\r Do not worry about STATUS=Draft - this field is not used in our instance.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Enter/update daily time for every added task and then click the \\\"Notes\\\" icon in the project line. Fill the daily notes in the appeared popup.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hours are entered in the Task's row. It will also update hours in the Project's row.\\r Notes are entered in the Project's row.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need to clean the reported hours for some day - first enter any (non-zero) hours on that day and press Enter, and then clean the hours and press Enter again. Hours should disappear from both Task and Project rows.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For off-hours - check OVERTIME checkbox (clarify this with your Project Manager if any doubts).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":95681,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2ce8a458-dadb-4450-9924-7eea79959029/psa 10.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2ce8a458-dadb-4450-9924-7eea79959029/psa 10.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"psa 10.PNG\",\"name\":\"psa 10.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2ce8a458-dadb-4450-9924-7eea79959029\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":662,\"height\":490.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Alternatively - double-click the day cell (in the Projects row) that you want to enter notes for. Complete the fields in the daily note’s popup.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In most of the projects, it is mandatory to provide the Notes for all days having hours reported. You will not able to submit a timecard if any required daily notes are empty.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need to report to two or more different tasks for the same project - you should repeat the operations starting with pressing \\\"Copy Selected Schedules\\\". This will create additional Project's and Task's rows pair and allow to enter separate Notes for each Task's hours in the Project's row.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When all hours and notes are entered - click Submit button:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":71002,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/752cd0d1-8ddc-43ae-8e85-079bb21866ff/Capture999999.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/752cd0d1-8ddc-43ae-8e85-079bb21866ff/Capture999999.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture999999.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture999999.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"752cd0d1-8ddc-43ae-8e85-079bb21866ff\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028,\"height\":163},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Click \\\"Continue\\\" when the following dialogue box appears\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":27630,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/50aca88c-2035-4b46-9bab-962bfaf67a7a/psa12.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/50aca88c-2035-4b46-9bab-962bfaf67a7a/psa12.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"psa12.png\",\"name\":\"psa12.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"50aca88c-2035-4b46-9bab-962bfaf67a7a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":403,\"height\":245},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
